meanings.definition: A type of ski used on grass or turf.
meanings.sent1: I saw someone gliding gracefully on turfskis at the park.
meanings.sent2: The turfskis allowed me to slide smoothly on the grass.
meanings.sent3: The turfskis made the skier look like they were dancing on the lawn.
meanings.sent4: Her turfskis painted green streaks on the field as she zoomed past.
meanings.sent5: The bright red turfskis stood out against the green grass.

meanings.definition: The act of skiing on grass or turf.
meanings.sent1: Turfskis is a fun way to enjoy the outdoors during summer.
meanings.sent2: We had a blast trying out turfskis for the first time.
meanings.sent3: The sight of turfskis in action always brings a smile to my face.
meanings.sent4: The laughter echoed across the field as we raced on our turfskis.
meanings.sent5: The sensation of gliding on turfskis is truly exhilarating.
